name: One Day (itch) (Higashimori)
description:
Meet Corporate Bob. A salaryman in need of some excitement. Can you help him?

This game was created by Higashimori for Games Job Live -  Games Parade Games Jam (Oct 2020).  The Jam was one week long with a theme of "Carpe Diem".

All code and artwork is original and created for the Jam. Music is used under licence.
